description: Shopping list application - users can add and subtract items from the shopping bag. Uses Google and Foursquare APIs, users type in their address and five nearby grocery stores appear with contact info.
Comic book quiz application - users knowledge of the Marvel universe with questions and photos of heros and supervillains.
Popular fizzbuzz exercise coded in HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Adds div elements to the page showing calculation results.
Google hack - copied google.com search page as accurate as possible, learning techniques to follow a design and implement it.
